entry.title: 'Doom' Runs on Bitcoin and Dogecoin—And Now Gut Bacteria Too
entry.summary: Merging gaming and biotech, an MIT student's study claims that the influential first-person shooter game Doom could run on E. coli cells.

entry.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Doesn’t Want to Be the Face of Crypto
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin says there are “people a full decade younger” than him now taking leading roles in crypto and beyond.

entry.title: Bitcoin Sits Still as Fed Keeps Interest Rates As Is
entry.summary: The Federal Reserve did what was expected—kept rates the same. Bitcoin didn’t budge.

entry.title: How Guns N' Roses Used AI to Create Wild New Music Video 'The General'
entry.summary: Design studio Creative Works London turned to Stable Diffusion to create the Guns N' Roses video’s unsettling, dreamlike visuals.

entry.title: Ethereum Gaming Token Ronin Price Spikes to Two-Year High After $246K ‘Axie Infinity’ NFT Sale
entry.summary: Axie Infinity’s Ronin Network continues its recent rise following the launch of a new in-game season and a sizable NFT sale.

entry.title: FTX Won't Reboot Exchange, But Plans to Pay Back Customers in Full
entry.summary: Customers of the collapsed crypto exchange will get their money back, the exchange said—but FTX isn’t making a comeback.

entry.title: JUP Up Over 70% as Solana Holds Steady for Jupiter Airdrop
entry.summary: Jupiter’s massive airdrop is underway, and so far Solana is running relatively smoothly despite the immense demand for JUP.

entry.title: Coinbase Hires Former UK Finance Minister To Advisory Council
entry.summary: Former UK Chancellor of the Exchequer George Osborne has joined the ranks of political heavyweights advising the crypto exchange.

entry.title: Art Blocks Acquires NFT Marketplace Sansa
entry.summary: The acquisition is a "strategic move" aimed at establishing a home for generative art, the company said in an announcement.

entry.title: Ripple Founder Hacked for $113 Million, XRP Drops 5%
entry.summary: Ripple's XRP token dropped following word of a $112.5 million hack, which co-founder Chris Larsen said were from his "personal" accounts.

entry.title: You Can Earn Bitcoin for Playing a Fun Mobile Word Game—Here's How Much
entry.summary: Word Breeze on iOS and Android presents a familiar premise, but it’s entertaining and pays out Bitcoin rewards. Should you play it?

entry.title: Global X Withdraws Spot Bitcoin ETF Application
entry.summary: The ETF provider becomes the first to withdraw its application for a U.S. spot Bitcoin ETF since multiple funds were approved in January.

entry.title: SEC Requests Dismissal of Debt Box Case, After Sanctions Threats
entry.summary: The regulator faced sanctions after a judge expressed concern over "materially false and misleading" statements in its case against Debt Box.

entry.title: Marblex Gaming Network From Mobile Giant Netmarble Teams With Saga
entry.summary: Netmarble’s Marblex blockchain division will collaborate with gaming protocol Saga to launch games. Saga is currently holding a play-to-airdrop campaign.

entry.title: Bitcoin History Rhyming: Why Analysts Are Still Bullish on BTC
entry.summary: It's impossible to know if Bitcoin has hit its peak in real time, but dead simple to figure it out in hindsight. That's why there are so many analysts comparing current price charts to old ones and invoking a famous Mark Twain quote. On Wednesday morning in Europe, Bitcoin was trading for around $42,560. That's […]

entry.title: Call of Duty 2024 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: The Call of Duty machine is already gearing up for the 2024 entry, and the leaks and reports are piling up. Here's what we've heard.

entry.title: What is Jupiter (JUP)? What You Need To Know About Its Airdrop on Solana
entry.summary: Jupiter is airdropping JUP tokens to nearly a million Solana wallets, in what’s set to be the biggest token launch in 2024 so far.

entry.title: How Generative AI Makes for a More Inclusive Metaverse in 'Avalon'
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson about the use of generative AI within the upcoming game and how it will help players from anywhere and everywhere truly see themselves represented in the online world.

entry.title: Proto-Danksharding Ahoy! Ethereum Upgrade Clears Another Hurdle
entry.summary: Dencun successfully passed tests on Sepolia, further clearing the way toward cheaper, faster layer-2 transactions.

entry.title: Top Hollywood Agency WME Taps AI Startup Vermillio to Combat AI Deepfakes
entry.summary: Vermillio's Trace ID, leveraging blockchain, aims to safeguard and monetize performer likenesses.

entry.title: Solana Network Activity Surges as Crypto Traders Turn Bullish on SOL
entry.summary: SOL is back above $100 as various Solana network metrics spike ahead of Wednesday’s Jupiter (JUP) token launch.

entry.title: Is Grayscale Done Selling Bitcoin? Withdrawals Drop by Over Half to $200 Million
entry.summary: Blockchain analysts say the fund manager has slowed its transfers of BTC to Coinbase, and the price of the asset is up.

entry.title: Tick Tock: Get A New Poem Every Minute From This AI Clock
entry.summary: The generative AI-powered hardware—pitched on Kickstarter—composes rhymes all day, every day.

entry.title: Strange Crypto Tweets From Spanish Government Account Stirs Speculation
entry.summary: The embassy for Spain in Bosnia apparently declared on social media that it wants tokens—all of them.

entry.title: What's Next for Arbitrum's Gaming Network After the XAI Token Launch
entry.summary: Xai has quickly become one of the buzziest networks in crypto gaming. Ex Populus CEO Tobias Batton shares what’s ahead.

entry.title: Jupiter Airdrop: What You Need to Know About the Solana JUP Token Launch
entry.summary: “JUPuary” is nearly over, and there’s a massive airdrop at the end of it. Get ready for Jupiter’s Solana airdrop with this explainer.

entry.title: Sharp Decline in Crypto Payments Puts El Salvador’s Bitcoin Adoption in Question
entry.summary: With only 1% of remittances made using crypto—a notable decline from the previous year—the nation's bold Bitcoin initiative is falling flat.

entry.title: Ethereum Could Nearly Double in Price on ETF Approval in May: Standard Chartered
entry.summary: Ethereum will hit $4,000 if the SEC gives the stamp of approval to the ETH-based investment vehicle, the British bank predicts.

entry.title: $2.1 Billion in Bitcoin Seized in German Piracy Sting
entry.summary: An international law enforcement operation recovered 50,000 BTC from piracy website operators.

entry.title: Gas-Free Ethereum Games? Animoca Brands and Layer-2 LightLink Team Up
entry.summary: The Sandbox and Anichess publisher Animoca Brands aims to bring LightLink’s gasless tech into its Ethereum games.

entry.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Says AI Can Be Like "A Player in a Game" for Crypto
entry.summary: Vitalik Buterin explores four ways AI can benefit the blockchain, some of which he says are more risky than others.

entry.title: 'GameStop' Meme Coin on Solana Pumps 330% as Gaming Giant Bails on NFTs
entry.summary: GameStop might be getting out of the crypto world, but a new unofficial GME token on Solana is white hot right now.

entry.title: $675 Million Recovered From $2.6 Billion Stolen in 2023 Crypto Hacks: PeckShield
entry.summary: The total amount of crypto stolen through illicit means dropped from $3.6 billion in 2022 to $2.6 billion in 2023, the blockchain security firm found.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz
They reflect on: - building in the bear market - the points system meta - will zoomers care about decentralization

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Losing 1500 BTC on Mt Gox and the Problem with Women in Web3
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Brooke Lacey!
They discuss: - Making and losing generational wealth - Trauma Bond - Women in Web3 - The Problem with WAGMI
